about_the_game:
Greengrocer's is a clicker game where you click vegetables! Get a random vegetable every 3 hours and grow your collection!

Features:

Vegetables: Carrot, Potato, Tomato, Lettuce, Cucumber, Broccoli, Spinach, Kale, Bell Pepper, Zucchini, Cauliflower, Pumpkin, Sweet Corn, Radish, Eggplant, Asparagus, Green Beans, Peas, Beetroot, Artichoke, Cabbage, Celery, Leek, Brussels Sprouts, Turnip and even more!

Items to grow your collection

You might get a Rotten Tomato, Cosmic Cabbage, Legendary Eggplant, and more!

A community that's veggies-crazy! Design submission via Discord! That's right! ALL our vegetables are made with community effort and inspiration! You also can join us! :D

100 achievements for 100 clicks!

Discover the letters of the achievements one by one, note them down and discover the vegetable password!

After all, it's better to eat vegetables than some fruit like bananas...

Drop pool chances:

Every 3 minutes, you earn a new normal or rotten vegetable! (85% chance)

Every 45 minutes, you earn a rare vegetable! (58% chance)

Every 2 hours, you get a magical or cosmic vegetable! (34% chance)

Every 3 hours, you receive a legendary vegetable! (8% chance)

Every 4 hours you receive unknown vegetable! (1/4 000 000 chance)

Every 5 hours, you have a chance to receive a SUPERSEXYVEGGIE! It's a true rarity for your Greengrocer's. The chance to get such wonders is only 1/15,000,000.

highlighted.name: Bananas: Flimsy and slimy, unlike the solid potato
Carrots stay crunchy; bananas go squishy.
Cucumbers are cool; bananas are just sad and droopy.
Tomatoes may be messy, but at least they’re not bananas.
Peppers pack a punch; bananas pack a whimper
Lettuce stays crisp; bananas just decay
Onions make you cry, but at least they’re not bananas
Broccoli stands tall; bananas just flop over
Garlic smells strong; bananas just smell rotten
Radishes have bite; bananas are just soft and sad

detailed_description:
Just Updated

Join our Discord! Keep up to date with all the latest news, create your own vegetables and make money from them!


About the Game

Greengrocer's is a clicker game where you click vegetables! Get a random vegetable every 3 hours and grow your collection!

Features:

Vegetables: Carrot, Potato, Tomato, Lettuce, Cucumber, Broccoli, Spinach, Kale, Bell Pepper, Zucchini, Cauliflower, Pumpkin, Sweet Corn, Radish, Eggplant, Asparagus, Green Beans, Peas, Beetroot, Artichoke, Cabbage, Celery, Leek, Brussels Sprouts, Turnip and even more!

Items to grow your collection

You might get a Rotten Tomato, Cosmic Cabbage, Legendary Eggplant, and more!

A community that's veggies-crazy! Design submission via Discord! That's right! ALL our vegetables are made with community effort and inspiration! You also can join us! :D

100 achievements for 100 clicks!

Discover the letters of the achievements one by one, note them down and discover the vegetable password!

After all, it's better to eat vegetables than some fruit like bananas...

Every 3 minutes, you earn a new normal or rotten vegetable! (85% chance)

Every 45 minutes, you earn a rare vegetable! (58% chance)

Every 2 hours, you get a magical or cosmic vegetable! (34% chance)

Every 3 hours, you receive a legendary vegetable! (8% chance)

Every 4 hours you receive unknown vegetable! (1/4 000 000 chance)

Every 5 hours, you have a chance to receive a SUPERSEXYVEGGIE! It's a true rarity for your Greengrocer's. The chance to get such wonders is only 1/15,000,000.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel i5 10500 / AMD Ryzen 7+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher or what u want
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo for example
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Whatever :)
  • Processor: the best u can get
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Greengrocer's is a clicker game where you click vegetables! In Greengrocer's, you click vegetables to gain even more vegetables! For every 3 clicks, you get a new vegetable! You will also receive extra vegetables for the time you spend managing your Greengrocer's.
